fields.headline: Flying visit
fields.bodyText: Why now? Because the festival season is about to get underway, from Festimad (June 9-10) to Las Noches Mágicas (July 15-29) featuring Björk. Probably the best is Summercase (July 13-14), touted as the urban Benicassim and taking place simultaneously in the capital and Barcelona. Bands include Bloc Party, Arcade Fire and the Kaiser Chiefs (tickets from €105, summercase.com). Getting there BA (ba.com) from Gatwick and Heathrow; easyJet (easyjet.com) from Bristol, Edinburgh, Gatwick, Liverpool and Luton. Where to stay On the chic at boutique chain Room Mate (four hotels, doubles from €80, room-matehoteles.com). Where to eat Burgers are the festival staple, so try an El Bulli burger from chef-guru Ferran Adriá's Fast Good chain, (fast-good.com), which has two outlets in the city.
